description.long: Enhances the to hit debuff potential of a power by {Boost.Attrib.ToHitDebuff.Scale}%.  NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into to hit debuff powers that require a to hit check.

Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and to hit debuff potential of a power by {Boost.Attrib.ToHitDebuff.Scale}%.  NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into to hit debuff powers that require a to hit check.

Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into to hit debuff powers that require a to hit check.

Enhances the to hit debuff potential of a power by {Boost.Attrib.ToHitDebuff.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into to hit debuff powers that require a to hit check.

Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into to hit debuff powers that require a to hit check.
Provides a chance to cause minor negative energy damage to your targets.  This effect will trigger roughly 3.5 times per minute.
